txt.en:
After encountering the elusive cold-worm, Forsting, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

As you inspect Forsting's tail, you wonder if the etched scars upon the scales signify some status of the beast within the Frost-horde.

You decide to bring this trophy to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards, so that it might be preserved once Gundabad is reclaimed.
Deliver Forsting's tail to Belga Defthand at Steepset
Belga Defthand can be found at Steepset in MÃ¡ttugard.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Gundabad. You should deliver it to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards.
After encountering the elusive cold-worm, Forsting, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

'What have you brought me now?'

Belga Defthand inspects Forsting's tail closely, holding it up to the light at Steepset.

'Ah, this shall make a fine trophy! I shall preserve this rare find. Let us hope fewer of the Frost-horde shall trouble us in the days to come!'
